articles.title: Preserved Roman swords dating back 1900 years found hidden deep in Dead Sea cave - USA TODAY
articles.description:
Researchers in Israel found a cache of Roman swords hidden deep in a Dead Sea cave where the 1,900-year-old
weapons were "excellently preserved."
articles.content:
A cache of "excellently preserved" Roman weapons tucked away in an isolated cave near the Dead Sea have been discovered by Israeli researchers.
